title: Services in Support for Business and Innovation in Croatia - Key Account Management
objective:
This action will establish and provide the innovation support services addressing in general Croatian SMEs with significant innovation activities and in particular the beneficiaries of the SME instrument. This action will provide continuation of the SSBI-CRO-KAM-2 proposal which is currently implemented under the remit of H2020 
In particular defining innovation support packages  for:
ï Key Account Management (KAM) of successful SME Instrument applicants to identify bottlenecks to creation of economic impact in companies benefiting from grants by Horizon 2020,
ï Enhancing client SMEís capacity to manage innovation processes increasing their efficiency and effectiveness.
Project partners UniSt, STEPRI, TPV, Tera and HAMAG-BICRO will each individually provide number of service packages according to the analysis of regional needs (regional coverage, number and readiness of clients).
Envisaged outcome of this action is to provide services to SMEs in 2017-2018, including all beneficiaries of support under the Horizon 2020 SME instrument.
